verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come to the Savior, make no delay-- Here in His Word He has shown us the way; Here in our midst He’s standing today, Tenderly saying, “Come!”

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Joyful, joyful will the meeting be, When from sin our hearts are pure and free, And we shall gather, Savior, with Thee, In our eternal home.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: “Suffer the children!” O hear His voice! Let ev’ry heart leap forth and rejoice, And let us freely make Him our choice: Do not delay, but come.

verse.name: v3
